values: I Am the Lord, and Besides Me There Is No Savior: Education for Exultation — In GodI Am the Lord, and Besides Me There Is No Savior: Education for Exultation — In God

Our calling is to know and believe that God is God — that he is sovereign, that he is Savior through Jesus Christ our Lord.Our calling is to know and believe that God is God — that he is sovereign, that he is Savior through Jesus Christ our Lord.
